projects.title: Ingredients
projects.description:
1 package of uncooked crescent rolls, 
1 ¬Ωlb sausages, cooked and drained  
6 eggs, slightly beaten  
1 TBS salt  
2 cups of grated cheese  
1 cup of milk

projects.title: Instructions
projects.description:
1. Preheat oven to 350‚Å∞  
2. Place uncooked rolls on bottom of greased 9 in x 13 in pan  
3. In a large bowl, mix sausages, eggs, salt, cheese, and milk.  
4. Pour mixture over rolls.  
5. Bake for 45-60 Mins

projects.title: Ingredients
projects.description:
1 Cup brown sugar  
¬Ω Cup corn syrup  
¬Ω Cup butter  
¬Ω Tbs salt  
4 Qts popped popcorn  
¬Ω Tbs baking soda

projects.title: Instructions
projects.description:
1. Mix sugar, corn syrup, butter, and salt in a microwave-safe dish. 
(recommend: ¬´PYREX¬ª not ¬´Pyrex¬ª dishes) 
2. Microwave mixture for 4 minutes 
3. Put popcorn in a paper grocery bag. 
4. Add baking soda to mixture, and stir untillbit foams up. 
5. Pour mixture over popcorn, close bag, & shake. 
6. Microwave popcorn for 2 minutes and shake. 
7. Microwave popcorn for 2 more minutes and shake before serving

projects.title: Ingredients
projects.description:
1 package of German chocolate cake mix  
1 ¬º sticks of margarine (melted)  
‚Öî Cup sweetend condensed milk  
1 Cup chopped nuts  
1  14 oz package of kraft caramels  
1 16 oz package of chocolate chips

projects.title: Instructions
projects.description:
1. Preheat oven to 350‚Å∞. 
2. In a large bowl, combine cake mix, margarine, ‚Öì Cups milk, and nuts by hand. 
3. Grease 9in x 13in pan. 
4. Spread ¬æ of cake mixture into pan. 
5. Bake for 6 minutes. 
6. While cake is baking, melt caramels in a saucepan with ‚Öì Cup of milk, stirring constantly until mixture is completely melted. 
7. After taking pan out of the oven, sprinkle chocolate chips all over the cake. 
8. spread caramel over chocolate chips. 
9. Separate remaining cake mix into bits and dab over caramel layer. 
10. Bake for 16 more minutes. 
11. Cool for 5 minutes before refrigerating for 30 minutes. 
12. Cut into squares and serve.

projects.title: Ingredients
projects.description:
Cake : 
1¬Ω Cup oil  
2 Cups sugar  
4 eggs  
2 Cups grated carrots  
1¬Ωcups chopped nuts  
2 Cups flower  
2tsp baking powder  
1¬Ω tsp baking soda 
1 tsp salt  
2 tsp cinnamon   
1  8¬Ωoz can of crushed pineapple, drained 

Frosting:  
1   8 oz package of cream cheese  
1 lb powdered sugar  
1 tsp vanilla

projects.title: Instructions
projects.description:
Cake instructions: 
1. Preheat oven to 350‚Å∞. 
2. Blend oil and sugar. 
3. Add eggs, one at a time. 
4. add carrots and nuts. 
5. Sift together flower, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon. 
6. Add flower to carrot mixture alternately with drained pineapple. 
7. Pour mixture into 9 x 12 pan. 
8. Bake for 35-40mins.  

Frosting Instructions 
1. Blend cream cheese with sugar. 
2. add vanilla and enough milk to bring to spreading consistency. 
3. spread frosting on cake
